conversation.question: Why such a weird name "ReinventingWheel" ? Isn't that supposed to be a bad thing ?
conversation.answer: Well ‚Ä¶ Yes and No ‚Ä¶ Reinventing the wheel is a phrase which essentially means wasting time in inventing something that already exists. In industrial context, it's bad because it is inefficient because it's basically wasting time. However in educational context, it's not. It actually represents our key motive here. We are not trying to invent anything new. We are a curious bunch who want to learn inner workings of various things which already exist in this world.
